column6:
The story you never knew! Before she was Ms. Marvel, Carol Danvers was a secret agent for the Air Force.,2008,10
Imprisoned by an unforgiving enemy, Carol must withstand her captor's brutality and find some way to save America.
Rated T+ ...$2.99
